name: Explore Fuel
author: Fuel
description: A modern and user-friendly tool that allows real-time analysis and monitoring of the Fuel blockchain, providing detailed insights into transactions, blocks, and smart contracts.

name: Fuel Front-Chain
author: Cumulo
description: Explore the Fuel dashboard by Cumulo, your ultimate tool for monitoring and analyzing real-time data from the Fuel blockchain

name: Fuel Wallet
author: Fuel
description: With the Fuel Wallet,you can explore DApps on Fuel and manage your crypto assets, all in one place

name: Fuelet
author: Fuelet
description: The leading and non-custodial account abstraction wallet on Fuel

name: Fuel Bridge
author: Fuel
description: The Fuel Bridge allows users to seamlessly transfer assets between the Ethereum and Fuel blockchains.

name: Sway Farm
author: Fuel
description: Sway Farm is a very simple and fun game developed by the Fuel Network team.

name: Sway
author: Fuel
description: Sway Playground is an online development environment for writing, testing, and deploying smart contracts on the Fuel blockchain.

name: Fuel Name Service
author: Fuel Name Service
description: A platform that allows users to claim domain names on Fuel, which is a big step towards the adoption of Web3.

name: Thunder
author: Thunder
description: Thunder is the superior NFT marketplace on Fuel.

name: Swaylend
author: Swaylend
description: Sway Lend is a decentralized lending platform built on the Fuel blockchain, enabling users to borrow and lend digital assets.

name: Spark
author: Composability Labs
description: All-in-one DeFi hub on Fuel Network, with an integrated order book for seamless trading of your favorite assets

name: MIRA
author: Mira Finance
description: A decentralized exchange (DEX) that allows users to trade, swap, and manage liquidity on the Fuel blockchain using an efficient Automated Market Maker (AMM).

name: Bako Safe
author: Bako Safe
description: The native non-custodial multi signature wallet of Fuel Network

name: Kasiopea
author: Kassiopea inc
description: Ensure safe, simple, and scalable trading of commodities, RWA, and cryptocurrencies for everyone.

name: Oxiswap
author: Oxiswap Ltd
description: Lightning-Fast Decentralized Exchange Built On The Fuel Network

name: ENVIO
author: Envio
description: The fastest, most flexible way to get on-chain data. Any EVM L1, L2, L3 & Fuel.

name: Sentio
author: Sentio XYZ Inc
description: End-to-end observability platform to help you gain insights, secure assets and troubleshoot transactions for your decentralized applications

name: Common Ground
author: Common Ground
description: Common Ground is a Web3 community communication platform designed to be user-owned and operated in a decentralised way.

name: ORAO
author: ORAO
description: Oracle network designed to provide agnostic, accurate and customised data to multiple blockchains, including real-time data such as e-sports scores, weather reports and insurance prices.

name: Pyth Network
author: ORAO
description: A decentralised oracle network designed to bring real-world data into smart contracts on multiple blockchains.

name: Griffy
author: https://www.tantheta.io/
description: The first ever truly decentralised prediction market with on-chain order matching

name: Fluid Protocol
author: Fluid Protocol
description: USDF is the native decentralized stablecoin for Fuel
